reviewText: so now have all 6 Volumes of  Romance is in the Flash of the Sword II and just got throw Romance is in the Flash of the Sword II: Volume 6 and I can say it's great even tho it was shorter then volumes 1-5 the story for this volume is beautiful and from a guy that's saying alot this finale chapter is easily to say the best being the main story line hero get his princess at the end each time I see a anime even a hentai that is more about love then sex it make me think that what a good story is about the love that 2 people find in them selves. be true love is not about sex but about the people and that what more anime shooed be about That's why I give Romance is in the Flash of the Sword II: Volumes 1-6 a  100 stars for there story line for making the story of it about the hero finding love with all this women and all of them loving him in return
Romance Is In The Flash Of The Sword Volume are great to have all volume yes it was a great dvd to
